community.title: Community

messages.deleteMessageConfirm: Do you want to delete this message for everyone?

vpn.reason1: Privacy Protection: We protect all users' privacy from suspicious activities
vpn.reason2: Fraud Prevention: VPN is sometimes used in fraudulent activities
vpn.reason3: Security: We ensure a safe environment for all community members
vpn.reason4: Compliance: We comply with international security and privacy standards
vpn.step1: Turn off VPN/Proxy: Disable any VPN or Proxy service
vpn.step2: Restart your browser: Close and reopen your browser
vpn.step3: Sign in again: Try accessing your account without VPN
vpn.warningNote: Continuing to attempt access using VPN may result in temporary account suspension to protect platform security. A warning email has been sent to your email address.
vpn.understood: I understand, I will turn off VPN

reports.title: Report Message
reports.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why you are reporting this message...
reports.note: The report will be reviewed by the admin team and appropriate action will be taken.
reports.success: Report submitted successfully. It will be reviewed by the admin.
